subject: Order #SSN4763
description_text:
Hi.

I know my order was dispatched over 10 days ago now. I havent had any
further updates since. Can you please confirm whats going on?

I understand its the holiday season. But other vendors are posting
reasonably quickly still.

Kind regards

*Z.BURROWS*

conversations.body_text: Hi Zachary Burrows,       I see that the order has arrived in Australia, but it may take some additional time to be delivered.Â
